p: 36,750 compounds from the Maybridge library and 19,329 compounds of the Asinex library from the ZINC database were obtained and prepared in the ligprep module of Schr√∂dinger. This step is crucial for processing input structure. The optimization was carried out by the OPLS 2005 force field, which produced the low-energy isomers with ready to dock poses (LigPrep, n.d.).
